capstone.gui.containers

Class Sliders

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.gui.containers.Sliders

  • public class Sliders
extends java.lang.Object
    Class grouping the sliders that select note values.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
